title: International Relations for all!
description: Spanning five courses, we delve into social science concepts, modern world history, and Indonesia's unique perspective. Explore international trade, business, and security, equipping yourself with research methods and understanding diplomacy. Analyze developed countries' foreign policies, explore international law, and unravel the global economic architecture. Conclude by focusing on Indonesia's trade policy, East Asian regional integration, and global trade diplomacy. Join us on this intellectual odyssey to deepen your understanding of the intricate dynamics shaping our globalized world
bio: Hey there, I'm Cantikaputri Febrianti, a 2022 graduate from Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, with a major in International Relations. My fascination lies in parliamentary diplomacy and the broader spectrum of international affairs. Dreaming of becoming an IR lecturer, I'm on a mission to decode the intricate dynamics shaping our interconnected world.
